verses.verse: My Father is omnipotent, And that you can't deny; A God of might and miracles- 'Tis written in the sky.
verses.refrain: It took a miracle to put the stars in place, It took a miracle to hang the world in space; But when He saved my soul, Cleansed and made me whole, It took a miracle of love and grace!
verses.verse: Though here His glory has been shown, We still can't fully see The wonders of His might, His throne- 'Twill take eternity.
The Bible tells us of His power And wisdom all way through, And every little bird and flower Are testimonies too.
